snippet: In Brandon Ballengée’s solo show, art and science are linked, especially in his examination of the effects of the BP Deepwater Horizon oil spill.
abstract: Holland Cotter reviews artworks by Brandon Ballengee at Ronald Feldman Fine Arts gallery.
lead_paragraph: In Brandon Ballengée’s solo show, art and science are linked, especially in his examination of the effects of the BP Deepwater Horizon oil spill.

headline.seo: BRANDON BALLENGéE: ‘Collapse: The Cry of Silent Forms’
headline.main: Brandon Ballengée: ‘Collapse: The Cry of Silent Forms’
headline.print_headline: Brandon Ballengée; ‘Collapse: The Cry of Silent Forms’
